Description_lang: Every ${$s2*$t1/$s1} sec in combat, you gain 1 Holy Power.
AuraDescription_lang: Every ${$s2*$t1/$w1} sec in combat, you gain 1 Holy Power.

description_blz.en_US: Every 12 sec in combat, you gain 1 Holy Power.
description_blz.es_MX: Cada 12 s que pasas en combate, obtienes 1 p. de poder sagrado.
description_blz.pt_BR: Você ganha 1 de Poder Sagrado a cada 12 s em combate.
description_blz.de_DE: Im Kampf erhaltet Ihr alle 12 Sek. 1 Heilige Kraft.
description_blz.en_GB: Every 12 sec in combat, you gain 1 Holy Power.
description_blz.es_ES: Cada 12 s en combate, obtienes 1 p. de poder sagrado.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous gagnez 1 point de puissance sacrée toutes les 12 s en combat.
description_blz.it_IT: Ogni 12 s in combattimento fornisce 1 carica di potere sacro.
description_blz.ru_RU: Находясь в бою, вы раз в 12 сек. получаете 1 ед. энергии Света.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在戰鬥中每經過12秒，你獲得1道聖能。
description_blz.zh_CN: 在战斗中，你每12秒获得1层神圣能量。
